archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Analyze Sales Performance
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Brief Description Analyze sales performance against forecasts and strategy Extended Description Analyze sales performance against forecasts, strategy, measured by e.g. sales revenue, sales growth, sales quotas, new accounts won, upselling and cross selling, referrals, win/loss ratios, client retention, customer complaints/customer satisfaction. consider describing action that happens if threshold is not met, refer here to the generic metrics that were added in 15.0
